meta.title: SGP Yoga - Events
meta.description: Join our transformative yoga workshops, retreats, and teacher training programs

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.subtitle: We regularly offer themed workshops, transformative retreats, and comprehensive teacher trainings

aerial-yoga-sound-healing_10oct2025.title: Aerial Yoga Sound Healing
aerial-yoga-sound-healing_10oct2025.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in gentle, restorative aerial yoga accompanied by a deep sound healing session
aerial-yoga-sound-healing_10oct2025.fullDescription: This unique session is a blend of healing aerial yoga movements and sound therapy. We will start with a gentle sequence of poses utilizing silk hammocks, and towards the end you will listen to sound bowls and live mantra chanting while suspended in the air.

aerial-yoga-sound-healing_17oct2025.title: Aerial Yoga Sound Healing
aerial-yoga-sound-healing_17oct2025.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in gentle, restorative aerial yoga accompanied by a deep sound healing session
aerial-yoga-sound-healing_17oct2025.fullDescription: This unique session is a blend of healing aerial yoga movements and sound therapy. We will start with a gentle sequence of poses utilizing silk hammocks, and towards the end you will listen to sound bowls and live mantra chanting while suspended in the air.

aerial-yoga-photo_nov2025.title: Aerial Yoga Photo | Day of the Dead
aerial-yoga-photo_nov2025.shortDescription: Practice yoga in the air while a professional photographer captures the moment.
aerial-yoga-photo_nov2025.fullDescription: In this special day-of-the-dead yoga session you will have the opportunity to have professional photos taken while you practice yoga in the air, suspended in silk hammocks. Other than that, it will be a class as usual.

yoga-retreat_nov2025.title: Yoga & Nature Immersion
yoga-retreat_nov2025.shortDescription: A four-day retreat that combines yoga, spiritual philosophy, and connection to nature.
yoga-retreat_nov2025.fullDescription: This general-purpose retreat is meant to help you rejuvenate and regain harmony through Vinyasa and Kundalini Yoga. Our space in Salento is truly special; we will have several hikes to mountaintops, lakes and waterfalls. We will also cover the theoretical principles behind yoga and spirituality, touch mayan calendar knowledge, and connect through sharing circles and other activities. Food & accommodation are included, but transportation to the retreat place is at your own cost. For those who want to see a bit of Colombia, it is possible to extend the retreat by 1 day for a trip to Valle de Cócora for 1,000 MXN more.

aerial-teacher-training_jun2025.title: 100-Hour Aerial Yoga Teacher Training
aerial-teacher-training_jun2025.shortDescription: Become an aerial yoga teacher with our specialized training program.
aerial-teacher-training_jun2025.fullDescription: Aerial yoga is getting increasingly popular, not only because it looks great, but also because it makes more advanced poses accessible to beginners from day 1. Our 100-Hour in-person program is ideal for yoga teachers who want to expand their repertoire, but you can also participate as an absolute beginner. We will cover all the essential modules such as alignment, anatomy, philosophy, and more. Our sessions will take place on Saturdays in Hari Om Studio, Mexico City.

aerial-teacher-training_nov2025.title: 50-Hour Aerial Yoga Teacher Training
aerial-teacher-training_nov2025.shortDescription: Become an aerial yoga teacher with our specialized training program.
aerial-teacher-training_nov2025.fullDescription: Aerial yoga is getting increasingly popular, not only because it looks great, but also because it makes more advanced poses accessible to beginners from day 1. Our 50-Hour hybrid program is ideal for yoga teachers who want to expand their repertoire, but you can also participate as an absolute beginner. Our sessions will take place over the weekends in the beautiful Yoguitería in Calarca, Colombia. Although designed primarily as an in-person experience, this teacher training can be taken partially online - but two in-person weekends are required to obtain your Yoga Alliance certification.

aerial-yoga-sound-healing_30jan2026.title: Aerial Yoga Sound Healing
aerial-yoga-sound-healing_30jan2026.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in gentle, restorative aerial yoga accompanied by a deep sound healing session
aerial-yoga-sound-healing_30jan2026.fullDescription: This unique session is a blend of healing aerial yoga movements and sound therapy. We will start with a gentle sequence of poses utilizing silk hammocks, and towards the end you will listen to sound bowls and live mantra chanting while suspended in the air.

aerial-teacher-training_feb2026.title: 100-Hour Aerial Yoga Teacher Training
aerial-teacher-training_feb2026.shortDescription: Become an aerial yoga teacher with our specialized training program.
aerial-teacher-training_feb2026.fullDescription: Aerial yoga is getting increasingly popular, not only because it looks great, but also because it makes more advanced poses accessible to beginners from day 1. Our 100-Hour in-person program is ideal for yoga teachers who want to expand their repertoire, but you can also participate as an absolute beginner. We will cover all the essential modules such as alignment, anatomy, philosophy, and more. Our sessions will take place on weekends at Aguacate Studio, Mexico City.

yoga-healing-retreat_may2026.title: Yoga For Healing
yoga-healing-retreat_may2026.shortDescription: A transformative retreat focused on healing and inner connection at the mystical Lake Atitlán.
yoga-healing-retreat_may2026.fullDescription: This healing-focused retreat is designed to help you reconnect with yourself and restore inner balance. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of Lake Atitlán, one of Guatemala's most sacred and mystical places, we will practice Kundalini yoga, experience sound healing sessions, and explore meditation techniques to deepen your inner journey. Food, accommodation, and transportation from the airport to the retreat center and back are all included. For the adventurous souls who want to explore more of Guatemala, it is possible to extend the retreat by 3 days for a challenging hike to Volcano Acatenango & Fuego at an additional cost.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Our workshops are short but intensive sessions that explore specific aspects of yoga. We often blend physical exercise with breathwork, meditation, sound healing, and yogic philosophy - going beyond what's possible during a traditional class.

retreats.title: Retreats
retreats.description: To us, a retreat is a step back from the hectic reality of our daily lives. Our retreats are tailored to help you heal & transform, at the same time giving you space to rest and regain balance.

trainings.title: Teacher Trainings
trainings.description: The highest joy of a teacher is to see their students become wonderful yogis. Our teacher trainings give you all the tools you need to begin sharing the practice of yoga with the world. All our programmes come with an internationally-recognized Yoga Alliance certification and cover all the essential modules such as alignment, anatomy, philosophy, and more.
